contentBlocks.title: General Pool Heater Requirements
paragraphs: Pool heaters must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool heaters must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool heaters must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool heaters must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool heaters must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool heaters must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool heaters must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool heaters must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool heaters must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool heaters must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool heaters must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool heaters must be installed by a qualified person.
